section_header.title: About Us
section_header.subtitle: Get to know who we are and what we do

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To revolutionize global supply chain management through cutting-edge technology and strategic partnerships that drive efficiency and sustainability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the world's most trusted supply chain partner, enabling businesses to achieve operational excellence and competitive advantage.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Integrity, innovation, and reliability form the foundation of every partnership we build and every solution we deliver.

company_overview.title: Who We Are
company_overview.text: As PRIME TRADE GROUP MMC, we procure goods directly from importing and manufacturing companies across various sectors, offering them to our clients under competitive terms. Our company stands out with a diverse product portfolio, a flexible service mechanism, and a commitment to long-term partnerships.

section_header.title: Our Services
section_header.subtitle: Quality and reliable solutions tailored to various needs

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.text: Our company supplies products tailored to the needs of organizations operating in various sectors. The products we offer are distinguished by quality, functionality, and affordability, covering a wide range of solutions for different applications. The product categories we provide include the following key areas:

cta.title: Contact Us
cta.text: Reach out today to discover our solutions tailored to your needs!

cost_reduction.title: Cost Reduction
cost_reduction.text: Our strategic sourcing approach delivers average cost savings of 15-30% while maintaining superior quality standards across all categories.

speed_efficiency.title: Speed & Efficiency
speed_efficiency.text: Streamlined processes and automated workflows reduce procurement cycle times by up to 60%, accelerating your time-to-market.

global_network.title: Global Network
global_network.text: Access to our extensive supplier network spanning 80+ countries ensures optimal sourcing options for any requirement.

fortune.title: Fortune 500 Companies
fortune.text: Over 150 Fortune 500 companies trust us with their strategic procurement initiatives across diverse industries.

recognition.title: Industry Recognition
recognition.text: Award-winning procurement solutions recognized by leading industry associations and business publications.

certified.title: Certified Excellence
certified.text: ISO 9001, SOC 2, and industry-specific certifications ensure the highest standards of quality and security.

section_header.title: Contact Us
section_header.subtitle: We’re here to answer your questions and assist you

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Ready to streamline your procurement process? Contact us today for a consultation.

cta.title: Ready to Optimize Your Procurement?
cta.text: Join hundreds of companies that trust us with their procurement needs. Let's discuss how we can help streamline your supply chain operations.

helmet.title: Home - PRIME TRADE GROUP MMC
helmet.description: Discover PRIME TRADE GROUP MMC's expertise in global supply chain management, strategic procurement, digital transformation, and more. Explore our case studies and processes.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacyPolicy.dataCollection: We collect personal data such as name, email, and company details when you register, use our services, or contact us. We also collect usage data via cookies and analytics tools.
privacyPolicy.dataUse: Your data is used to provide services, process orders, improve our website, and send relevant communications. We ensure compliance with applicable laws.
privacyPolicy.dataSharing: We may share your data with trusted partners for service delivery or legal compliance. We do not sell your personal information.
privacyPolicy.userRights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. Contact us at privacy@company.com for requests.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of our procurement services and website.
termsOfService.use: You agree to use our services for lawful purposes and comply with all applicable regulations. Unauthorized use may result in termination.
termsOfService.liability: We are not liable for indirect damages arising from your use of our services. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for services.
termsOfService.termination: We may terminate your access for violation of these terms. You may terminate your account at any time.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies to enhance your experience on our website.
cookiePolicy.types: We use session cookies for functionality and persistent cookies to remember your preferences. Third-party cookies may be used for analytics.
cookiePolicy.management: You can manage cookies via your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect website functionality.
